name: Patchwork Kingdom #980 | Numhila
description: The twin kingdoms of Numhila, separated by a digital divide. A bustling kingdom of 228 schools on top that are all connected to the internet, and 152 schools, not connected, hidden in the upside down kingdom | Created for Giga (GigaConnect.org) — connecting every school in the world — in celebration of UNICEF's 75th birthday, by Nadieh Bremer
